15 Top Celebrities on OnlyFans, and Why You Should Join OnlyFans in 2023

Estimated Reading Time: 3 min 13 sec

Why do top celebrities prefer using OnlyFans to share their exclusive content? OnlyFans is less restrictive regarding the type of content the celebrities can post on the platform. Also, OnlyFans creators get to keep 80% of their total earnings on the platform plus a 5% referral commission. Therefore, top celebrities can rake in millions of dollars by converting their massive social media followers into paying or loyal fans. These are the two major reasons. 

Despite 70% of the content on OnlyFans being NSFW “not safe for work” content, there are top celebrities using the platform to share other types of content such as music or to relate and connect better with their loyal fans. Some of them have free subscription pages while others have premium pages only. Here is a list of the top celebrities on OnlyFans whose content you should check out:

Make an appointment now

1. Cardi B 

Grammy award winning Belcalis Almanzar, professionally known as Cardi B is among the top earners on OnlyFans. She is a famous songwriter and rapper having produced controversial hits such as WAP alongside Megan Thee Stallion and many others.

Despite many of her songs depicting various explicit sexual scenes and her having been a stripper before being famous, she does not use her OnlyFans to sell NSFW “not safe for work” content. She made it clear that her OnlyFans will not host any sexually explicit content. She uses her OnlyFans to share real life content. 

Cardi B does not post regularly on her OnlyFans. Despite this, and also refusing to share sexual content on her OnlyFans, she is still able to rank among the top earners on OnlyFans. Her fans love her content which is both uncensored and fun. She charges her fans a monthly subscription fee of $4.99 only. 

2. Blac Chyna 

Angela White, professionally known as Blac Chyna is a socialite and model with a huge social media following. Before she became famous, she was a stripper. She became known when Drake gave her a shout out in one of his songs back in 2010. 

Her rise to fame gained her a following that she converted to paying OnlyFans subscribers from April 2020. A huge chunk of her $200 million plus net worth is from OnlyFans. Reportedly, she makes $20 million from OnlyFans each month posting sexually explicit and fetish content.

According to her, she makes OnlyFans content to further her music career and take care of her kids. She desires to sustain her lavish lifestyle for her kids and her, and the best way she thinks she can attain that is by making OnlyFans content. The monthly subscription fee for her content is $19.99. 

3. Chris Brown 

Christopher Maurice Brown, shortened to Chris Brown, is famously known for his charming and admirable voice having produced several soothing R&B songs. He is also a great songwriter and outstanding dancer. All these aspects propelled him to a glamorous life of which he shares on various social media platforms gaining him numerous followers. 

Back in November 20, 2020, he debuted OnlyFans and shared his OnlyFans link to his fans on platforms including Twitter. Though, he did not clearly state the type of content he was going to post on the platform. 

Despite having been met with criticism due to the previous accusations of him battering women, he kept going and decided to keep posting content on OnlyFans. He goes all out to create content for his fans. The monthly subscription fee for his content is $20.  

4. Bhad Bhabie

Danielle Bregoli, whose stage name is Bhad Bhabie came into the limelight after featuring in Dr. Phil’s show. She was 13 at the time and was this wild child who could not listen to her mother. Her fame solidified once she started rapping having produced her hit song “Cash Me Outside” and many other songs. Her fame allowed her to pay off her mom’s mortgage, while aged 14. 

April 2021, marked her debut on OnlyFans having turned 18. She joined OnlyFans as a way to celebrate her 18th birthday and go wild sharing her explicit photos and videos. In about six hours, she banked over one million US dollars. According to her, she made more than $50 million after joining the OnlyFans family. 

Bhabie’s arrogant and aggressive attitude intrigues her fans and she is not afraid to go all out. Her OnlyFans account is among the top steamiest on the platform with OnlyFans recommending her account to its community. She charges a monthly subscription fee of $23.99. 

5. Rubi Rose 

Rubi Rose Benton, her real name, is a songwriter, rapper, and model. Her publicity started when she modeled in the Migos’ song “Bad and Boujee.” Rose later started writing songs and singing, making a name for herself in 2019 by releasing the song, “Big Mouth.” Her brief appearance in the song “WAP” by Cardi also propelled her to fame. 

In June 2020, Rose joined OnlyFans and made over $100,000 in 2 days by sharing her previous Instagram photos. Despite receiving several critics due to her posting teaser nudity content and using her previous content to make money on OnlyFans, she responded by reminding those complaining that OnlyFans allows anyone to post exclusive content, not necessarily sexual content. 

At some point, Rose was accused of running a scammer account because she charged a monthly fee of $49 yet she was posting her freely accessible Instagram content on OnlyFans. She later had to drop her pricing to $14.99. She shares an array of content not pointing towards a specific niche. 

6. Bella Thorne 

Annabella Avery Thorne, shortened to Bella Thorne, is a singer, actress, and writer. She is famously known for her acting career at Disney. She has sung songs such as “Watch Me” and written novels including Autumn’s Wish and Autumn’s Kiss. 

After the launch of OnlyFans, Thorne took advantage to monetize her following by joining OnlyFans in August 2020. Her first 24hrs on OnlyFans earned her a whopping $1 million. After a week on the platform, she reported to have earned more than $2 million. 

Despite several reports that Thorne’s OnlyFans account was a hoax simply because she did not post nudes as expected, she still kept posting content while reminding her fans that her content would not contain nudity. The sex workers community criticized her due to her decisions but she still stands by her decision not to go nude on the platform. Her current subscription charge is $0. 

7. DJ Khaled and Fat Joe 

Khaled Mohammed Khaled, famously known as DJ Khaled is a record producer, rapper, and record executive who has featured in several music videos alongside famous songwriters and singers such as Chris Brown. On the other hand, Fat Joe is a great rapper. The duo are great friends. They decided to join OnlyFans in January 2021. 

Despite OnlyFans being synonymized with adult content, the duo does not use OnlyFans to share NSFW content. They aim to motivate and provide their loyal fans insights on how to grow and live a great life. They also share behind-the-scenes coverage on their lavish lifestyles. 

To attain their dream of wanting to show their fans “the light,” they do not charge their fans a dime to subscribe to their page. According to the two, they aim to know who their actual fans are at a personal level. 

8. Lottie Moss 

Charlotte Moss, professionally referred to as Lottie Moss, is an outstanding model whose beautiful face and fit body gets numerous social media netizens interested in her posts and lifestyle. She has featured in the Paris and American Vogue boosting her outreach. 

In June 2021, she decided to join OnlyFans citing that she is a sexual being. She also complimented OnlyFans for allowing her the extra control she could not find on other platforms. 

Moss shares steamy and sexually explicit content on OnlyFans. Anyone can subscribe to her page for free, but she also offers a bundled selection of her best nudes and lingerie photos and videos at a fee. For a $100 monthly charge, a fan can have access to unlimited private sessions and chats with her. 

9. Austin Mahone 

Austin Harris Mahone, his real name, is a professional songwriter and singer. He became known through his YouTube channel which he used to create covers of famous pop songs. His songs include “What About Love,” “Mmm Yeah,” and more. 

In October 2020, Mahone officially joined OnlyFans citing his desire to share content with his fans without any limitations. He uses the platform to be honest and open with his followers showing them the other side of him. 

Mahone was shy at some point, but he has grown fond of sharing content he would otherwise reconsider. His account’s subscription fee is set to $0. But, he also started a premium page where he offers added merits such as unlimited free chats, zoom calls, custom content requests, and more. 

10. Trey Songz 

Tremaine Aldon Neverson, professionally named Trey Songz is a famous rapper and R&B singer. He has several awards including the BET (Black Entertainment Television) and the Ozone Awards. He has also featured in various films and TV shows. 

Trey Songz has a well-known record of illegal troubles such as accusations of rape and assault, but a leaked sexual video of his and another one depicting him spitting in the mouths of two damsels gave him the idea to join OnlyFans. He cashed in on the social media frenzy and talked to make cash from the platform.  

Songz’s OnlyFans page is cocky as he nicknames himself, “Mr. Steal Yo Girl.” He joined the platform in December 2020. He shares his exclusive and explicit content with his fans at a monthly subscription fee of $20.  

11. Larsa Pippen 

Larsa Marie Pippen is a socialite, businesswoman, and reality TV personality. She featured in the Real Housewives of Miami show and many others. She was also a fiancée to Scottie Pippen, Chicago Bulls’ legend NBA player. 

At the age of 47, she decided to join OnlyFans. Despite the criticism regarding her age and relationship controversies, she decided to show her fans her other side of the coin by opening an OnlyFans account in May 2021. 

Pippen does not charge a subscription fee to view her content. She aims to showcase herself modeling in her beloved dresses, jewelry designs, and swimsuits. To intrigue her fans, she shares her love life stories with her fans letting them in on how she came across several rich men desiring to have her but never found one befitting her. She challenges her fans to help her find the man of her dreams.  

12. Shanna Moakler 

Shanna Lynn Moakler is a renowned actress, reality TV star, and model. She kick-started her modeling career at the age of 14 and has appeared in magazines like Brentwood and Cosmopolitan. She has played various roles in great films such as Lois & Clark: The New Adventures of Superman.  

Moakler had posed nude before but did not think of joining OnlyFans. She considered it when Unruly offered to help her manage her OnlyFans account. According to her, she was not really sure what her limits on camera would be, but she was ready to have fun on camera. 

Although she was 46 when she debuted OnlyFans in June 2021, she readily showcased nudity and lingerie photos and videos for her fans. Any fan would hardly guess that she is 46 once they go through her profile. At the time of writing this article, the prior Miss USA, and mother of three charged $7.20 for 31 days to all her fans who desired to access her exclusive content.  

13. Amber Rose 

Amber Rose Levonchuck is a famous rapper, TV personality, and model. She gained public attention after appearing in Kanye West and Young Jerzy’s song, “Put On.” From that one-time opportunity, she went ahead to build a social media following of over 20 million followers on Instagram. 

Being a bisexual activist, Rose has a considerate say among the LGBTQ+ (lesbian, gay, bi, trans, queer, questioning and ace) community and aims to spread sexual positivity. Rose took advantage of her massive following and say on sexual positivity and teased her followers about creating an OnlyFans account. This move made her fans curious and prepared them for the inevitable possibility of Rose joining OnlyFans. 

In September 2020, after bearing her kid, she launched her OnlyFans business. Her account’s subscription fee is only $5. She makes it clear that the $5 covers for all of her steamy content. According to her, OnlyFans is like a digital strip club where she can express herself freely just like she did before. 

14. Tana Mongeau 

Tana Marie Mongeau is a YouTube star with varied online business, mostly known for her controversial and wild content. She also owns a podcast known as Cancelled. She has more than 5 million YouTube subscribers enjoying her semi-steamy content showcasing her beautiful body as she tries out various sexy outfits and more. 

Mongeau joined OnlyFans in May 2020 after Instagram decided to be stricter on creators that posted NSFW content. She desired freedom to post her wild parts and that is what she got once she joined OnlyFans earning her over $6 million in 2021. 

Mongeau posts sexually explicit content on her OnlyFans page which is free to subscribe to. She even collaborated with Lana Rhoades, an ex-pornstar, to produce content. She charges extra for specific types of content such as pay-per-view content.

15. Carmen Electra 

Tara Leigh Patrick, professionally named Carmen Electra is an elegant and beautiful singer, media personality, model, and actress. She has also published a book, How to Be Sexy. Her looks have made society deem her a “pop culture icon” and “sex symbol.” She has featured in numerous TV shows, films, games, and music videos.

With all the fame and following she amassed, she decided to be a part of the OnlyFans community in May 2022. In a short while, she rose to the top 0.01% models on the platform. Any fan can subscribe to her content for free but has to pay for extra pay-per view content. 

Electra loves OnlyFans because she gets to direct and control what goes into her videos and photoshoots. She does not restrict herself to a specific type of content and loves to connect with her fans at the deepest level.  

Make an appointment now

Why Should You Join OnlyFans today? 10 Reasons Why 

1. Minimal Experience is Required to Start 

You are not required to have any certification nor attend any classes to start an OnlyFans business. You are only required to determine the type of content you want to produce, start creating it, promote it, and keep adjusting your strategy.

If you have an initial social media following, you can convert the following to paying fans. On the other hand, if you do not have any social media following, you can start creating one by building content on famous social media platforms such as TikTok and Twitter. Once you have a considerable and loyal following, you can then launch your own OnlyFans business

If you do not know how to select an audience, choose a niche, create quality content, promote your content, you can easily learn everything by watching various tutorials. If you can afford it, collaborating with an OnlyFans agency can propel you to success quickly. 

2. It is Highly Rewarding 

The ROI (Return on Invest) of running an OnlyFans business is high due to you keeping 80% of your total earnings and yet the starting cost is affordable. You can sign up for an OnlyFans account as long as you are 18 years and above for free. Once you are verified, you can start posting and selling content all for free. 

You can actually start shooting content using your phone. There are several great video and photo editing software you can download to help you boost the quality of your content. With the rise in the use of Artificial Intelligence (AI), you have an array of AI video and photo enhancing tools to choose from. 

You can set up various earning channels on your verified OnlyFans account including a monthly subscription fee, pay-per-view content, stream gates, tips, and more. All these earning features are at your exposure allowing you to collect as much income as you can. 

3. You Choose When to Produce Content and Upload it 

If you decide to be a part of the OnlyFans community, you automatically become your own boss. You schedule when to create content, edit it, and post it. No one pushes you around to do the most or the least. It is all up to you. 

If you have extra tasks such as having to go to work, you can schedule your time to favor your OnlyFans business. That means you can create an extra income despite having to go to work. 

Moreover, OnlyFans allows you to schedule your posts natively. Therefore, you can choose when to produce a large quantity of content and schedule when to post each video and photo you shoot. Producing bulk content at a go allows you to fit other tasks such as your job into your schedule without harming your OnlyFans business. 

4. You Can Easily Scale Your Business

OnlyFans allows you to own two OnlyFans pages and earn from both. You do not necessarily need to create two OnlyFans pages when you get started, you can have one and later create another. You have the option of creating a free or premium subscription page. As a content selling tactic, you can create a free subscription page to attract a substantial number of loyal followers and then build a premium one to monetize your following. 

Additionally, you can easily grow your OnlyFans business to the point of owning a personal website. Once you can afford it, you can commission the creation of your website that replicates OnlyFans’ subscription model. For example, a top celebrity such as Tyga progressively built his OnlyFans business to the point of owning his own competing platform, Myyster. 

5. You Get to Do What You Truly Love 

OnlyFans lacks restrictions on the type of content you can post. Therefore, despite the type of content you would love to share to the world, may it be NSFW or SFW, you are welcomed to do so. The platform hosts a large chunk of NSFW content, but you can come in with something new such as karate, music, and more as long as you love what you are doing. 

OnlyFans aims to help creators socialize with their loyal fans and connect at deeper levels, levels they cannot attain on other social media platforms. You can share your personal life stories without having to worry about your content leaking because OnlyFans has implemented protective tactics to secure your content. 

If you would love to create anonymous content, OnlyFans is here for you. You can sell faceless content on the platform such as feet pics and converse fetish content. What determines your success is your creativity and relationship building strategies to convince your audience that your content is worth paying for. 

6. You Can Work from Home 

OnlyFans give you the freedom to work from home. You can set up your working space at home allowing you to shoot your content, edit it, and post it based on what your schedule on your whiteboard states. Being able to run your business from home gives you time to be with family while earning from your hard work. 

If you consistently grow your OnlyFans business, you can quit your 9-5 and concentrate on your OnlyFans business. You can also commission an OnlyFans agency like Fandafia Agency  to help you run your business while you focus on content production only. 

7. You Have Control Over the Workload

Owning an OnlyFans business gives you flexibility in terms of how much you want to work. The more valuable and quality content you create for your fans, the more income you make. Additionally, if you keep your fans engaged, you are likely to make income through tips. Generally, you get to determine how much content you want to post on OnlyFans. 

If you plan to take a long break from content creation, you can do that, inform your fans of the reasons you would not be creating content, and keep working on other projects until you are ready to keep running your OnlyFans business. 

8. It is a Great Source of Passive Income 

How about making money while asleep? OnlyFans allows you to make money on the fly as long as you consistently create and promote your content. OnlyFans processes all the payments made to your account and gives you access to different marketing tools. 

Being able to make passive income means you can work an extra job and still earn through OnlyFans. Additionally, you can set up more than one OnlyFans page to earn more passive income.

9. Ability to Build Credibility and Authority

If you do decide to delve into a topic that requires you to provide evidence and discuss your point of view, OnlyFans is the best place to do that. You can take the chance to have a personal discussion with subscribers who have the same view as yours, provide them with your research and personal findings to pull them to your side. 

For example, if you are producing fitness content, you have to prove to your OnlyFans subscribers that your methods work and are proven. The only way to show that is by referencing scientific research to help support your arguments regarding your work out tactics. This move helps you build authority and credibility.

10. You Do not Have to Run the Business by Yourself 

Many of the top celebrities on OnlyFans do not run their accounts by themselves. They seek help to manage their huge pool of subscribers. Some of them have huge production teams that help them create content, market it, and sell it. Some of the top celebrities have several consultants they reach out to when they desire to make big moves meant to earn them more. 

You do not have to be a beginner to seek help, if you are an expert OnlyFans creator, you can still seek help so that you can grow your business much quicker. The best aid at your exposure is an OnlyFans agency. A good OnlyFans agency assesses your page and optimizes its operations for success, offers you support, manages your account, responds to fans messages on your behalf, distributes and promotes your content to ensure you make consistent sales. 

Conclusion

OnlyFans is home to several top celebrities such as Cardi B, Blac Chyna, and more due to the platform giving all their creators liberty to post any content they desire including NSFW and SFW “safe for work” content. Also, their creators get to keep 80% of their earnings. Top celebrities have had the chance to rake in millions from OnlyFans by converting their initial followings into paying fans. 

You also can start your own OnlyFans business despite having a following or not. You need to consult a great OnlyFans agency that knows the ins and outs of the platform and how to drive sales consistently. Keep in mind that joining OnlyFans is highly rewarding, requires minimal experience, and is a great source of passive income.

If you feel overwhelmed by the sheer number of processes you might have to go through to build a thriving OnlyFans business, do not feel low about your current situation.
